message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  It's a good offer for you to accept now as the value decreases over time.
I think we can both do better. I propose a more even split - I take $55, you take $45. Let's end this now and avoid further depreciation.
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent deal. The value is slipping away fast. I'll take $62, leaving you with $38.  Agree now, or it only gets worse for both of us.
